title: How to make a interesting conversation with my girlfriend on WhatsApp - Quora

response.answer_text: How do I make a interesting conversation with my girlfriend on WhatsApp? Well, if you’re on a relationship then I assume it happened because both of you enjoyed each other’s company and talking to each other, so it shouldn’t be hard to have an interesting conversation with her. Just talk about something you both are into and build it up from there. It all goes down to your interests in the end so there’s not much one can say about it.

Play 20 questions You can ask her any questions about anything and she can do the same. Questions can go from what’s your favorite flower to what’s your favorite sex the position. Be creative with the questions and make it interesting. This game can help you gain knowledge about the person you dating while curing your boredom .
